channel.title: Hi
channel.description:
hi
Server is borked, solution:
reset the map remove residence
Proof:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,511929.msg3729608/boardseen.html#new
Read reasons why people want to join, that's right! I am starting a petition. You will see, moparisthebest.
http://moparcraft.epetitions.net
1 signature, aiming for two

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You can narrow it down with a time limit.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Thanks.

but 2 weeks, don’t you think the logs might get a little big? If someones done a lot we could be scrolling through 30 pages of logs

Read full topic

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So far, unless the database gets too big, I’m trying to keep the new logs for 2 weeks, that would be better right?

You can either go here, or print out this handy sheet:
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/hawkeye/pages/other-information/usage/

0MnoQ.png878×1304

Read full topic

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:412515”]LWC doesn’t have options like that, or at least it didn’t last time we used it.

I thought residence was so people can live close together without having to worry about greifing.[/quote]

We have had tools like BB/hawk (whatever the new one is called) to combat griefing, I don’t see any need to have another tool to combat it? It’s just residence makes every bit of land you walk on feel like border control.

If a person gets griefed it’ll be settled shortly because it will be rolled back by a moderator. Oh, also some questions:

How long do the new hawk logs last?

What are the commands and so on?

Read full topic

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

LWC doesn’t have options like that, or at least it didn’t last time we used it.

I thought residence was so people can live close together without having to worry about greifing.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Force people to work together close together. The reason why the server gets borked is because people don’t trust each other and move out far away. Unlimited LWC, no furnace/door/sign protection. Just chests.

Read full topic
